name: CitySounds
0:
”Alexa open city sounds”
”Alexa ask city sounds to play for 8 hours”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: city sounds
des:
City Sounds plays soothing city sounds to help you relax or focus. Get transported to a quiet city night and drive away from any distractions. 

The sounds are played in a loop, so you can relax for as long as you need. You can also set a timer to have the sounds turn off automatically after a certain amount of time. 

City Sounds is a great way to improve your sleep quality, reduce stress, and boost your productivity. Try it today and see how it can help you relax and focus.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
